name: search
description: Search for baseball-related entities using the provided search term, and filter the results to show only baseball-related entities.

term.description: The search term to use for finding baseball-related entities.
term.title: Term

name: match_player_statistics
description: Get the statistics for a specific baseball player in the match by providing its ID.

id.description: The ID of the baseball match for which you want to get the player statistics. Default: 9864379 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: match_lineups
description: Get the lineups for a specific baseball match by providing its ID.

id.description: The ID of the baseball match for which you want to get the lineups. Default: 9864379 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: match_statistics
description: Get the statistics for a specific baseball match by providing its ID.

id.description: The ID of the baseball match for which you want to get the statistics. Default: 9864379 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: match_highlights
description: Get the highlights of a specific baseball match using the match ID.

id.description: The ID of the match for which you want to get highlights. Default: 9864379 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: match_schedules
description: This operation returns the baseball match schedules for the given date, including match timings, teams, and other relevant information.

day.description: The day of the month for which you want to retrieve the match schedules (1-31). Default: 1 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
day.title: Day

month.description: The month for which you want to retrieve the match schedules (1-12). Default: 8 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
month.title: Month

year.description: The year for which you want to retrieve the match schedules (e.g., 2022). Default: 2022 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
year.title: Year

name: match_details
description: Get detailed information for a specific baseball match by providing the match ID.

id.description: The ID of the match for which you want to get the details. Default: 9864379 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: live_matches
description: Get live baseball matches that are currently taking place.

name: match_odds
description: Get the odds for a specific baseball match using the match ID.

id.description: The ID of the match for which you want to get the odds. Default: 9864379 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: match_h2_hduel
description: Get the head-to-head duel for a specific baseball match using the match ID.

id.description: The ID of the match for which you want to get the head-to-head duel. Default: 9864379 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: match_votes
description: Get the votes for a specific baseball match using the match ID.

id.description: The ID of the match for which you want to get the votes. Default: 9864379 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: head_to_head_matches
description: Get head-to-head match data for a specific baseball match using its custom ID.

customId.description: The custom ID of the match for which you want to get the head-to-head matches.
customId.title: Customid

name: pre_match_form
description: Get the pre-match form for a specific baseball match using the match ID.

id.description: The ID of the match for which you want to get the pre-match form. Default: 9864379 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: player_near_matches
description: Get the near matches for a specific baseball player using the player ID.

id.description: The player ID for which you want to retrieve the near matches. Default: 977489 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: player_regular_season_statistics
description: Get the regular season statistics for a specific baseball player using the player ID, tournament ID, and season ID.

id.description: The player ID for which you want to retrieve the statistics. Default: 977489 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

tournamentId.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the player's statistics. Default: 11205 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
tournamentId.title: Tournamentid

seasonId.description: The season ID for which you want to retrieve the player's statistics. Default: 29168 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
seasonId.title: Seasonid

name: player_statistics_seasons
description: Get the statistics seasons for a specific baseball player using the player ID.

id.description: The player ID for which you want to retrieve the statistics seasons. Default: 977489 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: player_last_matches
description: Get the last matches played by a specific Baseball player by providing the player ID and page number.

id.description: The ID of the player for which you want to retrieve the last matches. Default: 1195558 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: player_image
description: Get the image for a specific baseball player using the player ID. Generates a PNG image.

id.description: The player ID for which you want to retrieve the image. Default: 977489 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: player_details
description: Get the details for a specific baseball player using the player ID.

id.description: The player ID for which you want to retrieve the details. Default: 977489 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: team_standings_seasons
description: Get the team standings for different seasons for a given team by providing its ID.

id.description: The ID of the team for which you want to retrieve the team standings for different seasons. Default: 3633 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: team_tournaments
description: Get the tournaments in which a specific baseball team participates.

id.description: The ID of the team for which you want to retrieve the tournaments. Default: 3633 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: team_logo_image
description: Get the logo image for a specific baseball team using the team ID. Generates a PNG image.

id.description: The team ID for which you want to retrieve the logo image. Default: 3633 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: team_next_matches
description: Get upcoming baseball matches for a specific team.

id.description: The ID of the team for which you want to retrieve upcoming matches. Default: 3633 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

page.description: The page number (zero-based) of the results you want to retrieve. Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
page.title: Page

name: team_details
description: Get the details for a specific baseball team using the team ID.

id.description: The team ID for which you want to retrieve the details. Default: 3633 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: team_near_matches
description: Get the near matches for a specific baseball team using the team ID.

id.description: The team ID for which you want to retrieve the near matches. Default: 3633 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: team_last_matches
description: Get the last matches for a specific baseball team by providing its ID and page number.

id.description: The ID of the baseball team for which you want to retrieve the last matches. Default: 3633 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

page.description: The zero-based page number of the results you want to retrieve. Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
page.title: Page

name: team_media
description: Get the media for a specific baseball team using the team ID.

id.description: The team ID for which you want to retrieve the media. Default: 3633 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: team_players
description: Get the players for a specific baseball team using the team ID.

id.description: The team ID for which you want to retrieve the players. Default: 3633 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: league_away_standings
description: Get the away standings of a specific baseball league for a specific season.

tournamentId.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the away standings. Default: 19442 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
tournamentId.title: Tournamentid

seasonId.description: The ID of the season for which you want to retrieve the away standings. Default: 49349 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
seasonId.title: Seasonid

name: league_details
description: Get the details of a specific baseball league using the unique tournament ID.

tournamentId.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the league's details. Default: 11205 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
tournamentId.title: Tournamentid

name: league_home_standings
description: Get the home standings of a specific baseball league for a specific season.

tournamentId.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the home standings. Default: 19442 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
tournamentId.title: Tournamentid

seasonId.description: The ID of the season for which you want to retrieve the home standings. Default: 49349 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
seasonId.title: Seasonid

name: league_total_standings
description: Get the total standings of a specific baseball league for a specific season.

tournamentId.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the total standings. Default: 11205 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
tournamentId.title: Tournamentid

seasonId.description: The ID of the season for which you want to retrieve the total standings. Default: 29168 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
seasonId.title: Seasonid

name: league_next_matches
description: Get the next matches for a specific baseball league using the tournament ID, season ID, and page.

tournamentId.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the league's next matches. Default: 11205 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
tournamentId.title: Tournamentid

seasonId.description: The season ID for which you want to retrieve the league's next matches. Default: 39143 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
seasonId.title: Seasonid

name: league_media
description: Get the media for a specific baseball league using the unique tournament ID.

tournamentId.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the league media. Default: 11205 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
tournamentId.title: Tournamentid

name: league_total_team_events
description: This endpoint retrieves the last 5 matches for a specific league in a given season for both home and away events.

tournamentId.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the total team events. Default: 19442 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
tournamentId.title: Tournamentid

seasonId.description: The ID of the season for which you want to retrieve the total team events. Default: 49349 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
seasonId.title: Seasonid

name: league_cup_trees
description: Get the cup trees for a specific baseball league using the tournament ID and season ID.

tournamentId.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the league cup trees. Default: 11205 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
tournamentId.title: Tournamentid

seasonId.description: The season ID for which you want to retrieve the league cup trees. Default: 29168 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
seasonId.title: Seasonid

name: category_tournaments
description: Get a list of all leagues from a specific baseball category using the category ID.

id.description: The category ID for which you want to retrieve all leagues. Default: 1374 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

name: league_away_team_events
description: This endpoint retrieves the last 5 matches for a specific league in a given season for away events.

tournamentId.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the away team events. Default: 19442 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
tournamentId.title: Tournamentid

seasonId.description: The ID of the season for which you want to retrieve the away team events. Default: 49349 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
seasonId.title: Seasonid

name: league_seasons
description: Get the seasons for a specific baseball league using the unique tournament ID.

tournamentId.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the league's seasons. Default: 11205 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
tournamentId.title: Tournamentid

name: category_schedules
description: Get the baseball match schedules for a specific day and category using the category ID, day, month, and year.

id.description: The category ID for which you want to retrieve the schedules. Default: 1374 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
id.title: Id

day.description: The day for which you want to retrieve the schedules. Default: 1 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
day.title: Day

month.description: The month for which you want to retrieve the schedules. Default: 8 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
month.title: Month

year.description: The year for which you want to retrieve the schedules. Default: 2022 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
year.title: Year

name: league_logo_image
description: Get the logo image for a specific baseball league using the unique tournament ID. Generates a PNG image.

tournamentId.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the league logo image. Default: 11205 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
tournamentId.title: Tournamentid

name: league_last_matches
description: Get the last matches for a league by providing the unique tournament ID, season ID, and the page number (0-based).

tournamentId.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the last matches. Default: 11205 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
tournamentId.title: Tournamentid

seasonId.description: The season ID for which you want to retrieve the last matches. Default: 39143 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
seasonId.title: Seasonid

page.description: The 0-based page number for which you want to retrieve the last matches. Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
page.title: Page

name: league_home_team_events
description: This endpoint retrieves the last 5 matches for a specific league in a given season for home events.

tournamentId.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the home team events. Default: 19442 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
tournamentId.title: Tournamentid

seasonId.description: The ID of the season for which you want to retrieve the home team events. Default: 49349 Minimum: -9223372036854776000 Maximum: 9223372036854776000
seasonId.title: Seasonid

name: categories
description: Get a list of all baseball categories.
